changeSet.author: huangzl
xiaohutu
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `bsc_att_link` MODIFY COLUMN `DETAIL_ID` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL COMMENT '附件文件记录ID' AFTER `RECORD_ID`, ADD COLUMN `DIR_ID` varchar(50) NULL COMMENT '附件文件夹ID' AFTER `DETAIL_ID`, ADD COLUMN `LINK_TYPE` char(1) NULL COMMENT '连接类型，a表示附件，d代表文件夹' AFTER `DIR_ID`;

changeSet.author: chenzh
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `aea_hi_item_matinst` ADD COLUMN `MEMO` varchar(1000) NULL COMMENT '备注' AFTER `ROOT_ORG_ID`;

changeSet.author: huangzl
chenzh
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `act_sto_timerule_inst` MODIFY COLUMN `USE_LIMIT_TIME` double(30, 1) NULL COMMENT '已用时' AFTER `IS_CONCLUDING`, MODIFY COLUMN `REMAINING_TIME` double(30, 1) NULL COMMENT '剩余用时' AFTER `USE_LIMIT_TIME`, MODIFY COLUMN `OVERDUE_TIME` double(30, 1) NULL COMMENT '逾期用时' AFTER `REMAINING_TIME`;

REMAINING_TIME, ti.OVERDUE_TIME OVERDUE_TIME, art_123.SIGN_STATE_ FROM ACT_RU_TASK art_123 LEFT JOIN ACT_HI_PROCINST ahp_123 ON art_123.PROC_INST_ID_ = AHP_123.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN ACT_STO_APPINST asa_123 ON asa_123.procinst_id = ahp_123.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN AEA_HI_APPLYINST ahap_123 ON ahap_123.APPLYINST_ID = asa_123.master_record_id LEFT JOIN AEA_LINKMAN_INFO ali_123 ON ali_123.LINKMAN_INFO_ID = ahap_123.LINKMAN_INFO_ID LEFT JOIN AEA_HI_PAR_STAGEINST ahs_123 ON ahs_123.APPLYINST_ID = ahap_123.APPLYINST_ID LEFT JOIN AEA_PAR_STAGE aps_123 ON aps_123.STAGE_ID = ahs_123.STAGE_ID LEFT JOIN AEA_PAR_THEME_VER ver ON aps_123.THEME_VER_ID = ver.THEME_VER_ID LEFT JOIN aea_applyinst_proj ap ON ap.APPLYINST_ID = ahap_123.APPLYINST_ID LEFT JOIN aea_proj_info proj ON changeSet.sql: UPDATE aea_item_basic a SET ITEM_CATEGORY_MARK = ( SELECT c.ITEM_CATEGORY_MARK FROM ( SELECT b.ITEM_CATEGORY_MARK, a.* FROM ( SELECT ib.ITEM_BASIC_ID, i.PARENT_ITEM_ID, ib.IS_CATALOG FROM aea_item_basic ib, aea_item i WHERE ib.item_id = i.ITEM_ID AND ib.IS_CATALOG = '0' ) a INNER JOIN aea_item_basic b ON b.item_id = a.PARENT_ITEM_ID GROUP BY ITEM_BASIC_ID ) c WHERE c.ITEM_BASIC_ID = a.ITEM_BASIC_ID ) WHERE a.IS_CATALOG = '0';

changeSet.author: CZH
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `aea_hi_item_matinst` MODIFY COLUMN `UNIT_INFO_ID` varchar(1500) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '业主单位ID【当MATINST_SOURCE=u】' AFTER `MATINST_NAME`, ADD COLUMN `MATINST_SOURCE` char(1) NULL COMMENT '材料来源，u表示单位，l表示个人，默认是u' AFTER `MEMO`, ADD COLUMN `LINKMAN_INFO_ID` varchar(50) NULL COMMENT '联系人ID【当MATINST_SOURCE=l】' AFTER `MATINST_SOURCE`, ADD CONSTRAINT `FK_AEA_HI_ITEM_MATINST_L` FOREIGN KEY (`LINKMAN_INFO_ID`) REFERENCES `aea_linkman_info` (`LINKMAN_INFO_ID`) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE RESTRICT;;

changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `aea_unit_proj_linkman` ( `PROJ_LINKMAN_ID` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `UNIT_PROJ_ID` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '单位与项目关联ID', `LINKMAN_INFO_ID` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '联系人ID', `LINKMAN_TYPE` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '人员类型，来自于数据字典，包括：1 负责人、2 总监理工程师', `CREATER` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '创建人', `CREATE_TIME` datetime(0) NOT NULL COMMENT '创建时间', PRIMARY KEY (`PROJ_LINKMAN_ID`) USING BTREE, INDEX `FK_AEA_UNIT_PROJ_L`(`LINKMAN_INFO_ID`) USING BTREE, INDEX `FK_AEA_UNIT_PROJ_LINKMAN_UPI`(`UNIT_PROJ_ID`) USING BTREE, CONSTRAINT `FK_AEA_UNIT_PROJ_LINKMAN_UPI` FOREIGN KEY (`UNIT_PROJ_ID`) REFERENCES `aea_unit_proj` (`UNIT_PROJ_ID`) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE RESTRICT ) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci COMMENT = '项目与单位的联系人关联表' ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

changeSet.author: chenzh
changeSet.comment: 获取流程定义的时限，更新到timerule_inst表
changeSet.sql: UPDATE act_sto_timerule_inst asti, ( SELECT ataf.APP_FLOWDEF_ID, ataf.TIME_LIMIT FROM act_tpl_app_flowdef ataf, ( SELECT APP_FLOWDEF_ID, TIME_LIMIT, ORG_ID FROM act_sto_timerule_inst WHERE IS_CONCLUDING = '0' ) temp WHERE ataf.APP_FLOWDEF_ID = temp.APP_FLOWDEF_ID AND ataf.TIME_LIMIT != temp.TIME_LIMIT AND ataf.IS_DELETED = '0' AND ataf.ROOT_ORG_ID = temp.ORG_ID ) temp2 SET asti.TIME_LIMIT = temp2.TIME_LIMIT WHERE asti.APP_FLOWDEF_ID = temp2.APP_FLOWDEF_ID
